rows.label: bf08350100_0010
rows.name: *sigh* Boss look worried...

rows.label: bf08350100_0020
rows.name: Maybe Boss lost wallet?

rows.label: bf08350100_0030
rows.name: It's not that.

rows.label: bf08350100_0040
rows.name:
Oh! I see!
Well, maybe your worry is your wallet's empty.

rows.label: bf08350100_0050
rows.name:
Well that's true.
I don't work much these days...

rows.label: bf08350100_0060
rows.name:
Hey... Why are you so interested in my
finances all of a sudden?

rows.label: bf08350100_0070
rows.name:
What is up with you, kid?
You've been a right gloomyguts lately.

rows.label: bf08350100_0080
rows.name:
Mmm...
I was thinking about Marveni.

rows.label: bf08350100_0090
rows.name:
If what Shin said is true, the Pope
doesn't just hate Blades...

rows.label: bf08350100_0100
rows.name: ...but humans too.

rows.label: bf08350100_0105
rows.name:
I mean, he basically hates
the whole world, seems like.

rows.label: bf08350100_0110
rows.name: How so?

rows.label: bf08350100_0120
rows.name:
In old Iira, humans lived together with Blades
that eventually became Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf08350100_0130
rows.name:
So destroying Iira was the same 
as destroying the Divine Beasts.

rows.label: bf08350100_0140
rows.name:
Marveni must have known that the Divine Beasts
have been dying off over the last few centuries.

rows.label: bf08350100_0150
rows.name:
Cannot live without Divine Beasts!
Everybody go bye-bye!

rows.label: bf08350100_0160
rows.name:
Maybe the Holy See saw it as an obstacle
to their power.

rows.label: bf08350100_0170
rows.name:
If the Blades were becoming Divine Beasts and creating new
land, people might have more faith in the Blades.

rows.label: bf08350100_0180
rows.name:
If a new faith emerged, it would threaten
the Holy See and its dogma.

rows.label: bf08350100_0190
rows.name:
I understand that much.
That's just war and politics.

rows.label: bf08350100_0200
rows.name: But...

rows.label: bf08350100_0210
rows.name: Rex...

rows.label: bf08350100_0220
rows.name:
Hating people, hating yourself...
and then hating the world.

rows.label: bf08350100_0230
rows.name: What comes after hating the world?

rows.label: bf08350100_0240
rows.name: You mean...

rows.label: bf08350100_0250
rows.name: Destroy it. That's all that's left.

rows.label: bf08350100_0260
rows.name: Tell me I'm wrong.

rows.label: bf08350100_0270
rows.name:
I'd like to call it a leap of logic,
but it's true that many do think like that...

rows.label: bf08350100_0280
rows.name: D'you remember?

rows.label: bf08350100_0290
rows.name:
Talking to the Pope...
I said it felt like talking to Metsu.

rows.label: bf08350100_0300
rows.name: Yeah. You did say that.

rows.label: bf08350100_0310
rows.name:
It's a funny thing.
Metsu and the Pope, they want the same thing.
